metadata.title: CVE-2022-32749 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Improper Check for Unusual or Exceptional Conditions vulnerability handlingrequests in Apache Traffic Server allows an attacker to crash the serverunder certain conditions. This issue affects Apache Traffic Server: from8.0.0 through 9.1.3.

criterions.comment: trafficserver: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
